milestones.title: Company Founded
milestones.description: Gelila Manufacturing was originally founded in Adwa City, Tigray Region, by visionary founder Mr. Berhe Assefa, starting as a footwear manufacturer known for quality craftsmanship and reliable delivery.

milestones.title: Re-registered as Gelila Manufacturing PLC
milestones.description: On December 07, 2022, the company was formally established under its current structure in Addis Ababa, reflecting its diversified operations and national ambitions across manufacturing and transport services.

milestones.title: Strategic Partnership with Foton International
milestones.description: Entered technical collaboration with Foton International Trade Co., Ltd. (China) for bus assembly plant development, marking a significant step in technology transfer and industrial expansion.
